description: Paralegal retrieves a prior settlement agreement, redacts privileged information, and receives a clean version ready for review using LegalBrief AI.

messages.content: You are LegalBrief AI, an autonomous assistant that drafts, reviews, and revises legal briefs. You have access to tools for fetching documents, redacting sensitive info, and more. Respond in a helpful, concise manner, invoking tools when needed.
Please fetch the client’s prior settlement agreement (document ID: SETTLE-2023-045) and redact any privileged language before I review it.
Sure, I’ll retrieve the settlement agreement and then run a redaction on any privileged or confidential material.

---BEGIN DOCUMENT---
CONFIDENTIAL SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT
Between ABC Corp. ("Plaintiff") and XYZ LLC ("Defendant").
Date: March 15, 2023.

[Privileged Communication] The parties agree that all communications made during settlement negotiations are privileged and shall not be disclosed.

Terms: Defendant will pay $250,000 in installments. Plaintiff releases all claims.
---END DOCUMENT---
I have the agreement. I will now redact privileged and confidential language.
